description: There is a kitchen on the image. On the right you can find a black microwave, and there is a bowl with a red substance inside it located in the center of the image. The bowl is inside the sink. It seems like you need to clean the bowl or make toasts.

objects.name: microwave
objects.location: The microwave is located in the center of the image. It's in the kitchen. There are no objects around
objects.relationship: There is a bowl inside the microwave
